mil3.7.7:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, kataraṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ puññaṃ vā apuññaṃ vā”ti?
mil3.7.7:1.5: “Apuññaṃ kho, mahārāja, karonto vippaṭisārī hoti ‘pāpakammaṃ mayā katan’ti, tena pāpaṃ na vaḍḍhati.
mil3.7.7:1.6: Puññaṃ kho, mahārāja, karonto avippaṭisārī hoti, avippaṭisārino pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati, passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedeti, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, tena kāraṇena puññaṃ vaḍḍhati.
mil3.7.7:1.7: Puriso kho, mahārāja, chinnahatthapādo bhagavato ekaṃ uppalahatthaṃ datvā ekanavutikappāni vinipātaṃ na gacchissati.
mil3.7.7:1.8: Imināpi, mahārāja, kāraṇena bhaṇāmi ‘puññaṃ bahutaraṃ, apuññaṃ thokan’”ti.
